presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.name: Hey, I'm Jie Chen
presentation.description: A Full-Stack developer with +3 years of experience in enterprise web application development at DXC Technology.

first.title: Business Applications Engineer
first.description: Develop scalable back-ends with Java Spring Boot and dynamic front-end components using Angular. Occasionally lead small teams to develop new features, such as multilingual support, update front-end stack, and provide support to team members.

first.title: Development of web applications
first.subtitle: Advanced Technician Diploma
first.description: In the Higher Vocational Training in Web Development, I gained hands-on experience in creating and managing dynamic websites and applications. I mastered technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue, etc. while also learning to design responsive, user-friendly interfaces. I further enhanced my skills through practical experience in projects and internships.
